12-31-53
Accepted 1-23-54 by Board of Directors
1. $1.00 per album, mailing expense
2. Budgeted at Norman Board Meeting. Balance lapsed by Board at
Ames, with provision for Promotion in new budget.
3. These funds may be used for no other purposes than those
designated by donors.
4. By Board action, $3,000.00 is earmarked for headquarter and
network operation until July 1. Action taken at Ames.
